name: Vast
summary: Vast combines JRPG elements with the FPS genre to create a unique and fresh hybrid game. A colorful cast of fun characters and enemies fill sprawling non-linear level designs to encourage exploration and adventure. Twisting and explosive enemy deaths leave behind ammo for multiple arm cannon weapon types. Voice-acted character dialogue and terminals of text and image provide an even deeper layer of discovery, and episodes are driven by mystery towards finding cosmic treasure before hordes of alien enemies can first!
